com.ibm.mobile.services.data

Interface IBMDataStorageProvider


  • public interface IBMDataStorageProvider
    The IBMDataStorageProvider class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Storage Provider interface. The storage provider is responsible for connecting/disconnecting.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerConnectCallback

        void registerConnectCallback(IBMDataStorageProviderConnectCallback callback)
        The registerConnectCallback class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Set the storage client event interface. It should be called before the connect method in order to receive all events. However it can be called at any time. Currently only one event client is supported.
        Parameters:
        callback - Storage client event interface to be added

      • unregisterConnectCallback

        void unregisterConnectCallback(IBMDataStorageProviderConnectCallback callback)
        The unregisterConnectCallback class is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Removes the storage client event interface. It can be called at any time. The Client will cease to receive events. Currently only one event client is supported.
        Parameters:
        callback - Storage Client event interface to be removed

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        The getType method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Type identifier of this Storage Provider
        Returns:
        Type.

      • getConnectionParameters

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getConnectionParameters()
        The getConnectionParameters method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Parameters returned after successful connection

      • connect

        void connect(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
             throws IBMDataFileException
        The connect method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Connects the Storage Provider. It doesn't block. Success or failure will be indicated by the event methods.
        Parameters:
        parameters - Key/Value pairs - It varies for different storage provider implementations.
        Throws:
        IBMDataFileException - Thrown if any error is identified during the initial connection stage, like missing parameters.

      • connected

        boolean connected()
        The connected method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Indicates if the Storage Provider is connected.
        Returns:
        boolean value indicating if the Storage Provider is connected.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        The disconnect method is a provisional API. APIs that are marked provisional are evolving and might change or be removed in future releases. Disconnect Storage Provider. It blocks until the it is disconnected.
